column7: Overview of multicultural counseling theory, empirical research, and practice; includes didactic as well as experiential learning components.  The goal of the course is to enhance students' multicultural counseling competencies, with regard to developing: (a) appropriate knowledge of specific cultural groups and sociopolitical issues, (b) cultural self-awareness, and (c) multiculturally relevant intervention skills. May not be repeated for credit.
column9: May not be repeated for credit.
